001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.AngleUnit;
004import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.AngularVelocity;
005import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.AxesOrder;
006import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.Orientation;
007
008import com.qualcomm.hardware.bosch.BNO055IMU;
009import com.qualcomm.hardware.bosch.BNO055IMUImpl;
010
011/** Class for imus
012 *
013 */
014@SuppressWarnings("unused")
015public class IMU extends Sensor<BNO055IMUImpl> implements IGyro {
016
017    private double angleOffset = 0;
018
019    public enum AxesSigns {
020        PPP(0b000),
021        PPN(0b001),
022        PNP(0b010),
023        PNN(0b011),
024        NPP(0b100),
025        NPN(0b101),
026        NNP(0b110),
027        NNN(0b111);
028
029        public final int bVal;
030
031        AxesSigns(int bVal) {
032            this.bVal = bVal;
033        }
034    }
035
036    private BNO055IMU.Parameters parameters;
037
038    /** Make an imu
039     *
040     * @param device The imu device
041     */
042    public IMU(BNO055IMUImpl device) {
043        super(device);
044        parameters = new BNO055IMU.Parameters();
045        degrees();
046        initialize();
047    }
048
049    /** Make an imu
050     *
051     * @param deviceName The device name in hardware map
052     */
053    public IMU(String deviceName) {
054        super(deviceName);
055        parameters = new BNO055IMU.Parameters();
056        degrees();
057        initialize();
058    }
059
060    /** Set angle format to degrees
061     *
062     * @return this
063     */
064    public IMU degrees() {
065        parameters.angleUnit = BNO055IMU.AngleUnit.DEGREES;
066        return this;
067    }
068    /** Set angle format to radians
069     *
070     * @return this
071     */
072    public IMU radians() {
073        parameters.angleUnit = BNO055IMU.AngleUnit.RADIANS;
074        return this;
075    }
076
077    public IMU initialize() {
078        getDevice().initialize(parameters);
079        return this;
080    }
081
082    /** Get gyro heading
083     *
084     * @return The gyro heading
085     */
086    @Override
087    public double gyroHeading() {
088        return getAngularOrientation().firstAngle;
089    }
090
091    public double gyroHeading(AngleUnit unit) {
092        return unit.fromUnit(device.getAngularOrientation().angleUnit, gyroHeading() - angleOffset);
093    }
094
095    @Override
096    public double gyroHeadingInDegrees() {
097        return gyroHeading(AngleUnit.DEGREES);
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    public double gyroHeadingInRadians() {
102        return gyroHeading(AngleUnit.RADIANS);
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public void setHeading(double newHeading) {
107        angleOffset = gyroHeading() - newHeading;
108    }
109
110    public IMU remapAxes(AxesOrder order, AxesSigns signs) {
111        try {
112            // the indices correspond with the 2-bit encodings specified in the datasheet
113            int[] indices = order.indices();
114            int axisMapConfig = 0;
115            axisMapConfig |= (indices[0] << 4);
116            axisMapConfig |= (indices[1] << 2);
117            axisMapConfig |= (indices[2]);
118
119            // the BNO055 driver flips the first orientation vector so we also flip here
120            int axisMapSign = signs.bVal ^ (0b100 >> indices[0]);
121
122            // Enter CONFIG mode
123            getDevice().write8(BNO055IMU.Register.OPR_MODE, BNO055IMU.SensorMode.CONFIG.bVal & 0x0F);
124
125            Thread.sleep(100);
126
127            // Write the AXIS_MAP_CONFIG register
128            getDevice().write8(BNO055IMU.Register.AXIS_MAP_CONFIG, axisMapConfig & 0x3F);
129
130            // Write the AXIS_MAP_SIGN register
131            getDevice().write8(BNO055IMU.Register.AXIS_MAP_SIGN, axisMapSign & 0x07);
132
133            // Switch back to the previous mode
134            getDevice().write8(BNO055IMU.Register.OPR_MODE, getDevice().getParameters().mode.bVal & 0x0F);
135
136            Thread.sleep(100);
137        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
138            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
139        }
140        parameters = getDevice().getParameters();
141        return this;
142    }
143
144    public AngularVelocity getAngularVelocity() {
145        return device.getAngularVelocity();
146    }
147
148    public Orientation getAngularOrientation() {
149        return device.getAngularOrientation();
150    }
151}
